menu.welcome:
Welcome, {{firstName}}!

To interact with this bot use keys below,
or commands (commands list /help).

timetable.error:
❌Request for date: {{date}}

Too far from today's date! The server did not return any result! To get today's timetable use /timetable.

week.unavailable: Week view is not available now!

untis_data.head: 👤*Untis profile:*
untis_data.invalid:
Data is not valid.
Your data will be deleted from channel and DB, so you need to provide us new valid data.

errors.ChangeData:
⛔️*Your data is not valid!*
Return to menu and try again.
errors.login:
⛔️*Failed to login!*
Your data will be deleted from channel and DB, so you need to provide us new valid data.

general.editDataFirst: Please finish editing the data before using other functions.

notifications.substit:
*ℹ️ Your lesson on {lesson.date} from {lesson.startTime} to {lesson.endTime} has been substituted with:*

📔 {lesson.subjects[0].fullName} ({lesson.subjects[0].shortName})
🧑‍🏫 {data}
🔢 {lesson.rooms[0].fullName} ({lesson.rooms[0].shortName})
notifications.canceled:
*ℹ️ Your lesson on {lesson.date} from {lesson.startTime} to {lesson.endTime} has been canceled:*

📔 {lesson.subjects[0].fullName} ({lesson.subjects[0].shortName})
🧑‍🏫 {data}
🔢 {lesson.rooms[0].fullName} ({lesson.rooms[0].shortName})
